description.value: You can shape the energy you channel in a single direction, reaching farther and in a more directed fashion. When you cast a version of @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Harm]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Heal]{Heal} that has an area, you can make its area a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] instead of a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30].
